scripts.pack:lib: ng build my-lib && cd dist/my-lib && npm pack
scripts.start:lib: npm uninstall my-lib && npm run pack:lib && npm run install:lib && ng serve test-packer --configuration=dev --port 9090
scripts.build:watch: npm run install:build && ng build my-lib --watch
scripts.sandbox:dev: ng build my-lib && npm run install:build && ng build test-packer --configuration=dev
scripts.sandbox:qa: ng build my-lib && npm run install:build && ng build test-packer --configuration=qa
scripts.sandbox:stag: ng build my-lib && npm run install:build && ng build test-packer --configuration=stag
scripts.sandbox:prod: ng build my-lib && npm run install:build && ng build test-packer --configuration=prod
scripts.build:dev: ng build my-lib && npm run install:build && ng build prod-packer --output-hashing=none --configuration=dev && npm run concat
scripts.build:qa: ng build my-lib && npm run install:build && ng build prod-packer --output-hashing=none --configuration=qa && npm run concat
scripts.build:stag: ng build my-lib && npm run install:build && ng build prod-packer --output-hashing=none --configuration=stag && npm run concat
scripts.build:prod: ng build my-lib && npm run install:build && ng build prod-packer --output-hashing=none --configuration=prod && npm run concat
